text:
e="preserve">William "Bill" Ramsey (25 April 1943 – 7 July 2020) was an English professional rugby league footballer. He was born in Leeds, West Yorkshire.
He played in the 1960s and 1970s, and coached in the 1970s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, Yorkshire, and Commonwealth XIII, and at club level for Hunslet, Leeds, Bradford Northern, Hull FC and Widnes.
Ramsey died on 7 July 2020, aged 76.
